name: The Great Farmstead Breakfast
description:
After a wild night partying in the Big City, a young aspiring farmer wakes up in his family's farm hoping for a big breakfast. Unfortunately, life gives one lemons, and today he must gather the necessary ingredients if he wishes to eat.

CONTROLS: 

  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move
  • Z to interact 
  • Enter to  open in-game "Tool Bar" / Start Game

ADDITIONAL CONTROLS:

  • Use the arrow keys up and down, press Z to toggle audio, and Enter to escape

NOTE:

  • Due to my inability to create music, the only soundtrack is the standard generic soundtrack provided with the sample project. 
  • Upon giving Mammy the ingredients, the sprite might appear to move slower than usual. This is NOT because of your device lagging, but rather because GB Studio is processing a large amount of data Behind the Scenes...
  • The Audio Controller is not well refined - the cursor may be buggy at times and flow around freely. However, it does work as it is intended to (for the most part)...

Words from Creator:

As always, I would like to extend my gratitude and thanks to all those who participated in the Beta tests prior to Public Release. This is my first debut game,  and I hope to be able to create more games in the future...

@adventure_hobbyist
